Social And Cultural Activities: Kabi Prasanna Patasani (i) High School, Mugagahir; (ii) Law College, Khurda; (iii) Sanskrit Mahavidyalaya, Malipada, Khurda; (iv) Education Complex, Dattatota Sahi, Puri; (v)High School , Ramachandi, Khurda; (vi) Girls High School, Orabarasingh, Khurda and Nirakarpur; (vii) Prasanna Patasani Girls High School, Muninda; (viii) Dr. Prasanna Patasani Electro Homeopathic Medical College and Hospital, Cuttack; (ix) Kalinga Kutir Jojana, Narangarh, Khurda; (x) Mahashi College of Natural Law, Santara Bandha, Augul; (xi) Dr. Patasani College of Schience and Education, Kaudakhuni (Brahmagiri); (xii) Father of Maharashi Institute of Creative Intelligence, Bhusandapur; (xiii) Father of Prasanna Nilayam, Padmapur, Balasore;(xiv) Prasanna patasani Dharmausilana Snastha, Konark Martial Art Academy, Gurujanga;(xv) Abadhuta Group of rebel poets in Oriya literature; and (xvi) Eastern Zone Writer`s Conference various cultural association (i) Arohi Cultural Association; (ii) Ghungur Cultural Association; (iii) Jayadev Sangeet Parisad, Bhubaneswar; and (iv) National Institute for Social Development and Information Science; assit the poor and needy people;interested in social reforms, up-lifting the economy of the general mass; took initiative in the formation of Khurda District.
Literary Artistic & Scientific Accomplis: ‘Bela’ and ‘Nagarika’; ‘Mukti Mandap’, ‘Kranti Dhara’ and ‘Purbasa’ (Oriya daily); editorial board of Ava, Sikha Mukti, Jawab, Long March, Janata Utkal Bahini and Jwala;His lyrics have been selected for the film titled as `Chilika The Beauty lagoon`;two music cassettes of Prasanna Patasani Lyrics namely`Pretirtha` and `Bhakti Nimalya` have been released
Special Interests: Writing, travelling, journalism, poetry recitation, acting and music
Educational Qualifications: M.A., LL.B., M.S.C.I., F.I.M.A. Ph.D, D. Litt.(Utkal), D.Sc.(Swiss)D.Litt. (South Africa) Educated at Utkal University, Bhubaneswar, Madhusudan Law College, Cuttack, Orissa, Maharshi Institute of Creative Intelligence, Rishikesh, Uttar Pradesh, Sheelsburg, Switzerland

Name: Patasani,Dr. (Prof.) Prasanna Kumar
Positions Held:
1980-98
Member, Orissa Legislative Assembly (four terms)

1989
Chairman, Estimates Committee, Orissa Legislative Assembly

1990-95
Cabinet Minister, Public Grievances and Pensions and Administration, Govt. of Orissa

1998
Elected to 12th Lok Sabha

1998-99
Member, Committee on Railways
Member, Consultative Committee, Ministry of Power

1999

1999-2000
Member, Committee on External Affairs
Member, Committee on Government Assurances

2002-2003

2002-2004
